oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Germán Castro Oral History Interview, 2011 November 08
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Germán Castro, conducted on November 08, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Germán Castro, pastor of El Shaddai Christian Church in Brentwood, discusses events concerning the church which flooded completely during the May 2010 flood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Castro, Germán--Interviews
